oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of Mary Austin Pitt and her deceased baby, John Pitt
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this image, Mary Austin Pitt holds her deceased baby son, John Pitt. The tintype was found in a soldier's 'housewife' (hayw016) that she made for her husband, Pvt. Henry Pitt, Co. B, 7th Tenn. Cav., CSA, who served under Gen. Nathan Bedford Forrest and died of wounds received at the Battle of Brice's Crossroads, Miss. on June 10, 1864. She later married William Hunley Winn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pitt, Mary Austin "Winn"; Pitt, John
